> Subject: info on upcoming Swordsmithing Course
>
> Hello sword enthusiast,
>
> SDK Supplies is pleased to run the annual Swordsmithing Course from  
> June 9-13 in Floradale, Ontario, Canada.  This is a 'hands-on'  
> course where participants will have the opportunity to hand forge  
> and shape a tanto (knife) blade from 1050 steel.  They will also  
> heat treat their blades using traditional clay coat hardening/ 
> tempering, and also do some finish stoning.  No previous experience  
> is necessary for this course.  More information on the course can  
> be found at this link:  http://www.seidokai.ca/gsjsa_smithing.htm
>
> If you would like further information, feel free to contact us.
>
> Brenda
> http://sdksupplies.com/catalog.htm
